note.p: Cutler and jeweller. Premises at 164 Oxford Street, London, 1861; and in the Burlington Arcade from 1865. Perhaps daughter of John Francis Walton and his wife, Elizabeth. Married George Morrell (1800/1–57) in 1835, and Thomas Read (1798/9–1882) in 1863.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1694/151/29), 1871 (RG10/1340/33/3)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 July 2019)
London, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1917 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 July 2019)
Prerogative Court of Canterbury will registers (The National Archives: Public Record Office PROB 11/2260/290)
